about_the_game:
Overview

Join Remy Raccoon in this festive special, exploring 11 brand new levels filled with fiendish traps, malevolent creatures and masses of festive fun. The creatures of the Lost Temple are getting ready for the festive season, but Remy sees this as the perfect opportunity to relieve them of a few more gems. Be warned though, only the bravest adventurer will collect all the gems and progress to the next level.

*** This is a stand-alone game, so you do not need the original game in order to play. ***

Gameplay

Remy Raccoon and the Lost Temple is a top-down dungeon crawler that sees our furry hero exploring the Lost Temple in search of treasure.

The object of the game is to collect all the gems from the Lost Temple, avoiding a variety of traps, creatures and other obstacles along the way. Collecting all the gems from one level will unlock the next, where you will face a new set of challenges.

Game modes

  • Play in Adventure Mode to unlock new levels.
  • Face an unpredictable set of challenges in Random Mode.
  • Replay some of your favourite levels as endurance challenges in Survival Mode.

Other cool stuff

Complete bonus challenges along the way to unlock candy canes. Complete all the candy cane challenges to unlock the legendary Candy Cane of Dominion.

Your adventure awaits...

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Additional Notes: Windows 7 & Windows Vista must be up to date with all service packs and also require DirectX 11 to be installed.

short_description: Remy Raccoon is back in this festive special of our cute, gem-grabbing arcade game. Join Remy in 11 brand new festive levels filled with fiendish traps and malevolent creatures. Your adventure awaits...
